thread.title: Great value and walking distance to major attractions.
thread.title_full: Great value and walking distance to major attractions. - Review of Holiday inn Express London - Vauxhall Nine Elms, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Juan T
title: Great value and walking distance to major attractions.
text:
From Gatwick it's a short 30 minute train ride and a 10 minute uber ride. or a 1 hr and 35 min easybus ride that will drop you a few steps from the hotel. Room was small by US standards but comfortable. Free breakfast which is a blessing in London. Staff are very friendly and knowledgeable of the area. Transportation it's very expensive, You'd Have to buy an Oyster card for a £5 deposit (refundable) and unlimited (bus only) for about £5 per day. Supermarkets are also at a short 8 minute walk. Plenty of pizza/kebab spots at cheap prices. Overall you can't go wrong by staying here if you are on a budget. If I had to add a bit of a negative it'd be the amount of kids that use this hotel and these youngsters can get a bit loud.
Room Tip: Any room away from Lambeth rd. See more room tips
